00047 TableMutator::TableMutator(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, Comm *comm,
00048     TableIdentifier *table_identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00049     RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr, int timeout)
00050     : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_comm(comm), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr),
00051       m_range_locator_ptr(range_locator_ptr),
00052       m_table_identifier(*table_identifier), m_memory_used(0),
00053       m_max_memory(DEFAULT_MAX_MEMORY), m_resends(0), m_timeout(timeout),
00054       m_last_error(Error::OK), m_last_op(0) {
00055 
00056   if (m_timeout == 0 ||
00057       (m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Client.Timeout", 0)) == 0 ||
00058       (m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Request.Timeout", 0)) == 0)
00059     m_timeout = HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT;
00060 
00061   m_buffer_ptr = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table_identifier, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr);
00062 }

00068 void TableMutator::set(uint64_t timestamp, KeySpec &key, const void *value, uint32_t value_len) {
00069   Timer timer(m_timeout);
00070 
00071   if (m_last_error != Error::OK)
00072     m_last_error = Error::OK;
00073 
00074   try {
00075 
00076     m_last_op = SET;
00077 
00078     sanity_check_key(key);
00079 
00080     if (key.column_family == 0)
00081       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid key - column family not specified");
00082 
00083     {
00084       Key full_key;
00085       Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family);
00086       if (cf == 0)
00087         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, (std::string)"Invalid key - bad column family '" + key.column_family + "'");
00088       full_key.row = (const char *)key.row;
00089       full_key.column_qualifier = (const char *)key.column_qualifier;
00090       full_key.column_family_code = (uint8_t)cf->id;
00091       full_key.timestamp = timestamp;
00092 
00093       m_buffer_ptr->set(full_key, value, value_len, timer);
00094     }
00095 
00096     m_memory_used += 20 + key.row_len + key.column_qualifier_len + value_len;
00097 
00098     m_last_op = FLUSH;
00099 
00100     if (m_buffer_ptr->full() || m_memory_used > m_max_memory) {
00101 
00102       timer.start();
00103 
00104       if (m_prev_buffer_ptr)
00105         wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00106 
00107       m_buffer_ptr->send();
00108 
00109       m_prev_buffer_ptr = m_buffer_ptr;
00110 
00111       m_buffer_ptr = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table_identifier, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr);
00112       m_memory_used = 0;
00113     }
00114 
00115   }
00116   catch (Exception &e) {
00117     m_last_error = e.code();
00118     memcpy(&m_last_timestamp, &timestamp, sizeof(timestamp));
00119     memcpy(&m_last_key, &key, sizeof(key));
00120     m_last_value = value;
00121     m_last_value_len = value_len;
00122     throw;
00123   }
00124 
00125 }

00129 void TableMutator::set_delete(uint64_t timestamp, KeySpec &key) {
00130   Key full_key;
00131   Timer timer(m_timeout);
00132 
00133   if (m_last_error != Error::OK)
00134     m_last_error = Error::OK;
00135 
00136   try {
00137 
00138     m_last_op = SET_DELETE;
00139 
00140     sanity_check_key(key);
00141 
00142     if (key.column_family == 0) {
00143       full_key.row = (const char *)key.row;
00144       full_key.column_family_code = 0;
00145       full_key.column_qualifier = 0;
00146       full_key.timestamp = timestamp;
00147     }
00148     else  {
00149       Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family);
00150       if (cf == 0)
00151         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, (std::string)"Invalid key - bad column family '" + key.column_family + "'");
00152       full_key.row = (const char *)key.row;
00153       full_key.column_qualifier = (const char *)key.column_qualifier;
00154       full_key.column_family_code = (uint8_t)cf->id;
00155       full_key.timestamp = timestamp;
00156     }
00157 
00158     m_buffer_ptr->set_delete(full_key, timer);
00159 
00160     m_memory_used += 20 + key.row_len + key.column_qualifier_len;
00161 
00162     m_last_op = FLUSH;
00163 
00164     if (m_buffer_ptr->full() || m_memory_used > m_max_memory) {
00165 
00166       timer.start();
00167 
00168       if (m_prev_buffer_ptr)
00169         wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00170 
00171       m_buffer_ptr->send();
00172 
00173       m_prev_buffer_ptr = m_buffer_ptr;
00174 
00175       m_buffer_ptr = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table_identifier, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr);
00176       m_memory_used = 0;
00177     }
00178   }
00179   catch (Exception &e) {
00180     m_last_error = e.code();
00181     memcpy(&m_last_timestamp, &timestamp, sizeof(timestamp));
00182     memcpy(&m_last_key, &key, sizeof(key));
00183     throw;
00184   }
00185 
00186 }

00188 
00189 void TableMutator::flush() {
00190   Timer timer(m_timeout, true);
00191 
00192   if (m_last_error != Error::OK)
00193     m_last_error = Error::OK;
00194 
00195   try {
00196 
00197     if (m_prev_buffer_ptr)
00198       wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00199 
00203     if (m_memory_used > 0) {
00204       m_buffer_ptr->send();
00205       m_prev_buffer_ptr = m_buffer_ptr;
00206       wait_for_previous_buffer(timer);
00207     }
00208 
00209     m_buffer_ptr->reset();
00210     m_prev_buffer_ptr = 0;
00211 
00212   }
00213   catch (Exception &e) {
00214     m_last_error = e.code();
00215     m_last_op = FLUSH;
00216     throw;
00217   }
00218 
00219 }

00222 bool TableMutator::retry(int timeout) {
00223   int save_timeout = m_timeout;
00224 
00225   if (m_last_error == Error::OK)
00226     return true;
00227 
00228   try {
00229     if (timeout != 0)
00230       m_timeout = timeout;
00231 
00232     if (m_last_op == SET)
00233       set(m_last_timestamp, m_last_key, m_last_value, m_last_value_len);
00234     else if (m_last_op == SET_DELETE)
00235       set_delete(m_last_timestamp, m_last_key);
00236     if (m_last_op == FLUSH)
00237       flush();
00238   }
00239   catch(Exception &e) {
00240     m_timeout = save_timeout;
00241     return false;
00242   }
00243   m_timeout = save_timeout;
00244   return true;
00245 }

00248 
00249 void TableMutator::wait_for_previous_buffer(Timer &timer) {
00250   TableMutatorScatterBuffer *redo_buffer = 0;
00251   int wait_time = 1;
00252 
00253   while (!m_prev_buffer_ptr->wait_for_completion(timer)) {
00254 
00255     if (timer.remaining() < wait_time)
00256       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "");
00257 
00258     // wait a bit
00259     poll(0, 0, wait_time*1000);
00260     wait_time += 2;
00261 
00265     if ((redo_buffer = m_prev_buffer_ptr->create_redo_buffer(timer)) == 0)
00266       continue;
00267 
00268     m_resends += m_prev_buffer_ptr->get_resend_count();
00269 
00270     m_prev_buffer_ptr = redo_buffer;
00271 
00275     m_prev_buffer_ptr->send();
00276   }
00277 
00278 }

00281 
00282 void TableMutator::sanity_check_key(KeySpec &key) {
00283   const char *row = (const char *)key.row;
00284   const char *column_qualifier = (const char *)key.column_qualifier;
00285 
00289   if (key.row_len == 0)
00290     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid row key - cannot be zero length");
00291 
00292   if (row[key.row_len] != 0)
00293     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid row key - must be followed by a '\\0' character");
00294 
00295   if (strlen(row) != key.row_len)
00296     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, (std::string)"Invalid row key - '\\0' character not allowed (offset=" + (uint32_t)strlen(row) + ")");
00297 
00298   if (row[0] == (char)0xff && row[1] == (char)0xff)
00299     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid row key - cannot start with character sequence 0xff 0xff");
00300 
00304   if (key.column_qualifier_len > 0) {
00305     if (column_qualifier[key.column_qualifier_len] != 0)
00306       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "Invalid column qualifier - must be followed by a '\\0' character");
00307     if (strlen(column_qualifier) != key.column_qualifier_len)
00308       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, (std::string)"Invalid column qualifier - '\\0' character not allowed (offset=" + (uint32_t)strlen(column_qualifier) + ")");
00309   }
00310 }
